message.body: Are you in Boston or did you go home for the feasting?
Stayed in Boston this year, but will be home in a month for an extended Christmas stay! :-)
Well awesome! I didn't go home either and may be in Boston tonight....! Do you have plans?
Whaa?!? That's craziness!! So my mom is in town today and tomorrow, which is somewhat occupying my time, but maybe something later this eve??
Keep me posted on your travels and we will figure something out!
Yea I'm flexible and also a planned trip is in order :) Have fun with your mom!!!
Hey! So I'm getting dinner with my mom now, but let me know where you are at/where you will be in a couple hours if you know!
For sure! Carolyn is around too and we may meet in Cambridge around 930 or so. Loose plans. I'll keep you updated
Hey, what are you up to?
Just got here and are going to Jacobs wirth's on Stuart street! Come!!!!
